text: The 1996 Individual Speedway Junior World Championship World Champion Piotr Protasiewicz get qualification to 1997 Speedway Grand Prix. ==World final== *August 4, 1996 * Olching, Olching Speedwaybahn * Referee: Christer Bergström * Spectators: about 3000 ==See also== 1996 World I J Individual Speedway Category:Speedway competitions in Germany
title: 1996 Individual Speedway Junior World Championship
